review: It's so easy to use and kid friendly! There's no need for cable tv anymore.

review: I love the Amazon Fire TV.  It was super easy to set up, a little difficult to open the battery section on the remote, & once set up has worked like a charm.  Within minutes I had numerous movies on my Watch List.  As a Prime Member this was a no brainer as the Amazon Fire TV gives me access to so much and most of it free.
author: C. Dunn

review: A little complcated to operate...No operators manuel come with and the help button was not much better.

review: It is by far the best thing that ever happened to video. It seems to do everything right the first time.
author: Robert G Payne

review: Amazon Fire TV has exceeded my expectations. The devise is very small, hardly takes up any room on a shelf, but I have a degree of access to programs I have never had before.I have Nexfix, PBS, more television shows old and new, and of course Amazon Prime movies. There is so much more flexibility in watching what I want to, when I want to. It was so easy to hook up, one cable goes to the TV and the other out to an outlet. That's it. I love it, and highly recommend.
author: Jeanne E. Gale

review: Love the fire tv, easy to hook up and then enjoy all the movies.. And Amazon Prime is Awesome too!!
author: Deon

review: 100% better picture than Chromecast!!! It cost much more, but it was so worth it! They are both set up the same way. I have Chromecast set upon my other TV's in my home. It did not work out for my bedroom as well. Then I watched a video comparing Roku, I Chromecast and Amazon Fire TV. The Amazon Fire TV was recommended over all of others.It does have more channels and options, like The Blaze TV.
